name: multi-Si wafer production | multi-Si wafer | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2604/documentation

The reference flow for the life cycle inventory is 1 square metre of wafer surface. The mc-Silicon columns are sawn into square wafers with a size 156x156 mm2 (0.0243 m2) and a thickness 240 um. The weight is 559 g/m2.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Sawing and cleaning of wafers. The process data include electricity use, water and working material consumption (e.g. stainless steel for saw-blades, argon gas, hydrofluoric and hydrochloric acid). Production wastes to be treated and process-specific NOx- and waterborne pollutants are considered. No data on other process specific air emissions.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Collection of data in 2005. Use of data from an environmental report for a production plant (ca. 3 million wafers per year) and some data from older publications.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Rough assumption for electricity use. This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data collection by factory representatives. Environmental report and LCA studies.
